message.entry: Cannot create a histogram with {0,number,integer} bins.
Ignoring imaginary part of complex inputs
Inputs to IMHISTC must be numeric
IMHISTC inputs 2, 3, and 4 must be DOUBLE
Second input to IMHISTC should be a scalar, positive integer
Third input to IMHISTC must be a nonempty scalar
Fourth input to IMHISTC must be a positive scalar
